Description.Text: Facilities Guests are welcomed at the hotel, which has a total of 149 rooms. The accommodation offers a restaurant, a dining area, a bar, room service and a business centre. Wireless internet access in public areas (no extra charge) allows travellers to stay connected. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning and a bathroom. A balcony is included as standard in most rooms, offering additional space for relaxation. There is also a safe. Additional features include a mini fridge and a tea/coffee station. Internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and WiFi ensure optimal comfort. Amenities in the bathrooms include a shower. A hairdryer can also be found in each of the bathrooms. The establishment offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. The terrace is a great place to while away the time. Leisure options at the accommodation include a gym, or for a fee, a sauna.
